個班藍屍中坑 最鐘意企係電視機前指點江山
仲要成日到見到佢地 每次都唔係操野而係吹水

Yesterday I had my personal training session in the gym and was soaking wet then I soaked in a jacuzzi. The gym is situated beside the jacuzzi where you can see the inside of the gym clearly. I saw a slender guy lift a three pound dumbbell for all he was worth but still couldn't complete the exercise lol. I enjoy hitting the gym and I know my personal trainer is worth her salt as I'm making good progress with my physique. She's a vivacious in-your-face woman who's sometimes too honest for her own good. I'm a fan of vince carter. He was certainly an exciting slam dunker who was worth his weight in gold to Raptors. Don't get me wrong- I still enjoy watching him.play even though he's past his prime. He proved his worth to Raptors by helping win multiple championships. His worth to the team was incalculable. I must say he's made dramatic progress with his three point shooting since he joined Nets. Unfortunately his leg injury has progressed fairly rapidly forcing him to be sidelined for six months because of his injury. He complained that a six-month hiatus is too long but it's for his own benefit. He has a follow-up to his doctor next month. His friend Lebron James is also gonna be out of commission until his back heals. He's made slow but steady progress with his shooting since he injured his back. His doctor said he was making good progress and will check on his progress next month. He assigned the blame for his back injury to a lack of stretching and training. Oh well it could be worse. His worth of contribution to Lakers is incalculable. Lakers is as likely to beat Cavaliers as warriors in my opinion. Recently Lakers didn't just beat Bulls. They wiped the floor with Bulls. Everybody was on the edge of their seats. Bulls has lost its edge to some extent since its point leaders left the team.  The other month Suns edged out Bulls by two points which reminds me of warriors eding out Cavaliers by three points. The ripe of every coach in every team is well defined. Everybody has a vital role to play in every team. In addition the government has established a commission to investigate the use of steroids among players. Another commission has also been set up to look at family violence in nba which I wholeheartedly support. The kickboxing organisation announced that a rematch between shane and oscar is in the works. During their first match oscar started off the fight with a right cross followed by a left uppercut which knocked him out. Apparently shane had a minor injury which took the edge of his performance. Both are fantastic fighters but in a rematch I think shane will edge the match. The fans are excited about the rematch but oscar has upped the ante by demanding a salary twice as much. Hopefully it'll eventually happen. My friend Joe is a oboe teacher. He explained to us regarding a piece by clementi "this passage should be played beautifully rather than rhythmically. Otherwise it's a bit cheap" I saw lots of his pencil marks on the scores such as: cantabile, silence, no pause here, just separate, clean pedal, more melodic voicing, remain soft, stay soft, quiet, hear tenor, clearer, articulate, in time, silvery soft, gentler, take time....Regarding teaching he said "I prefer payment in blocks. My students pay monthly or for four lessons at a time. For this month you can pay on a lesson-by-lesson basis because maybe you wanna see what it's like to have lessons. From next month onwards pay monthly. Students of all standards are welcome. I'm also an accompanist who accompany instrumentalists, singers and other performers for live performances, exams and auditions." We watched a comedy show which was full of cheap laughs. The comedian is famous for its vulgar manner and wearing a vulgar suit. His grandfather was a cheap gangster and liar. His jokes and jibes were cheap and vulgar.

My cousin used to work in physical. The wage was very low. My friend Fuyuki has opened a gym. So far it's been a great success. The excellent quality gym and shower equipment is a key factor in the.success of his gym. Of course customer service also plays a major role in the company's success. He asked me if I could find a good manager for him. I said "I can't make any promises but I'll see what I can do" My friend Tom has an interview for a marketing director position in Fuyuki's gym. Fuyuki laid heavy stress on the need for leadership qualities. He also stressed that clear communication is a crucial factor in the outcome of the interview. The interview stresse him out. I said "Don't stress over it. Just put your mind at ease." My brother also said "Try not to stress too much about it. Set your mind at rest." My girlfriend too said "Rest easy. Don't stress yourself out. It's going to be ok." Tom quit his previous job because the salary was low and his colleagues always bullied him. I asked "I don't blame you for wanting to leave" Last Tuesday we had supper at his place. His younger brother had Japanese homework to do. He said "I have to do part A but I haven't got to do part b" I said "I'll leave you doing your homework" He soaks up new vocabularies and grammar patterns very quickly. In the classes he soaks up everything the teacher says. When "Fukushima" is a Japanese word the stress is on the second third and last syllables. But when it's an english word you should only stress the third syllable. When he reads a novel he's like a sponge and soaks up the story. If he encounters computer problems he'll find jess who's an expert and soak up the advice she offers. His elder brother has an oboe exam next week. He said "after this exam I'll do grade eight next year or better still I'll directly take the diploma exam." After chatting with him in his room for a while I said "I'd better leave you to get on with it." My brother also said "I had better leave you to practise your exam pieces." My girlfriend too said "I'll leave you to get on with your practice." His eldest brother went to meditate in his room after supper so we left him to himself. His elder sister booked a massage session. She asked "had I better leave my wallet on the bedside table?" I said "you had better not leave it on the bedside cabinet during your session as someone might steal it" My brother said "hadn't you better leave it in your locker so that it's safe?" His younger sister has a job interview next friday. I said "I'm rooting for you. I'm there for you." My brother said "I support you. It's going to be ok. I've got your back." His eldest sister has a geography exam at university soon so he's busy with revision.i said "you got this. I believe in you." My brother said "you're almost there" When his professor was tutoring him in geography he said "That's coming along nicely. You're on the right track now. Keep up the good work. You're doing fine" Recently Fuyuki shouted at his brother and called him a liar due to a misunderstanding. I said "I can't believe you would say that to him" My brother too said "I can't believe you said that" Hell be throwing a birthday party tomorrow at his home but alas I can't attend as I got work to do. Last year he got a steinway for my birthday. I remember he said "I can't believe you got me a steinway" It didn't come cheap.
